section.p: The Admission Medications entry codes medications that the patient took prior to admission.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7698)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7699)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="42346-7" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:7700)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:7701, CONF:7702, CONF:7703)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7698)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7699)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="42346-7" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:7700)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:7701, CONF:7702, CONF:7703)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
